product_name: Keen Burlington High Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Keen Burlington High winter boots unite coziness and function with everyday fashion. Special dual-climate rubber outsoles grip slick sidewalks with ease. Abrasion-resistant nylon uppers feature full-length, medial side zippers to simplify getting in and out. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry while dissipating moisture inside the boots. 200g KEEN.WARM(TM) charcoaled bamboo/polyester insulation blend ensures warmth and comfort in cold conditions during active use. Faux fur linings help wick moisture away; synthetic shearling collars add warmth and style. EVA midsoles provide ample cushioning underfoot. Patented toe bumpers protect your feet from bumps and abrasion. Keen Burlington High winter boots feature dual-climate rubber outsoles that harden in the cold for extra bite into packed snow. Closeout.
short_description: The Keen Burlington High winter boots unite coziness and function with everyday fashion. Special dual-climate rubber outsoles grip slick sidewalks with ease.
